comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Bow Mountain is still one of my all-time faves, especially for a lunch-time ride. It's close, it's steep, and it has a bunch of exposure. Nice climb. As an aside, here's a great tip for cyclists like us who enjoy poking about the perimeters of lawfulness from time to time: keep a Sharpie in your jersey pocket. Today I used mine to add _Except for Steve and Dave_ to the Private Road sign at the base of the crux. Looked real nice. DU
